task: Develop a basic 'Mancala' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Remove ambiguities and convert to specifics'.
name: Mancala Precision

branding_data.short_description: Mancala Precision is a refined version of the classic Mancala game, emphasizing clarity and strategic depth.
branding_data.detailed_description: Mancala Precision takes the ancient game of Mancala and refines it for modern players seeking clear and strategic gameplay. By applying the oblique strategy 'Remove ambiguities and convert to specifics', this version eliminates any uncertainties in the rules and game mechanics. Players are presented with precise instructions and clear objectives, enhancing the tactical elements of stone distribution and capture. The game offers a minimalist design and intuitive interface, allowing players to focus on strategy without distractions. Mancala Precision is perfect for both beginners and seasoned players who appreciate a streamlined and exact approach to this timeless game.

strategy: Remove ambiguities and convert to specifics
